welcome_message: Welcome to GuardianChrono! I'm here to help you stay in sync with the world's time zones. Simply send me the name of a city, and I'll reply with the current local time and timezone there. If you need any assistance, just tap on the Help button or visit our website at sobstvennoai.dev to discover more projects. Let's get started!
description: This Telegram bot allows you to keep track of time in different cities around the world. You can get the current time, timezone, and difference in time, as well as convert time to different timezones. To use the bot, choose one of the following options: New City: Send the name of a city to find the local time in that city. For example, send 'Paris' to the bot and it will reply with the current time in Paris. Convert: Send a time and the name of a city to convert it to the user's local timezone. For example, send '12:00 PM New York' to the bot and it will reply with the time in your local timezone. Difference: Compare the time difference between two cities. To use this feature, tap on 'New City' button to add the first city, then select 'Difference' and add a second city to compare. Get started now and enjoy global time tracking from the convenience of your device.
